description:
calibre is the one stop solution to all your e-book needs.

calibre is an e-book manager. It can view, convert, edit and catalog e-books in all of the major e-book formats. It can also talk to e-book reader devices. It can go out to the internet and fetch metadata for your books. It can download newspapers and convert them into e-books for convenient reading. It is cross platform, running on Linux, Windows and macOS.
New features
- This is a pure bugfix release fixing various regressions in calibre 9.0
Bug fixes
- macOS: Fix crash when pasting cover image
  Closes tickets: 2139397
- Fix restore database not working
  Closes tickets: 2139455
- Windows: Fix the Read Aloud feature in the E-book viewer not working when using the Piper engine
  Closes tickets: 2139399
- Fix using icon themes in "For dark and light" mode not working
  Closes tickets: 2139454
- Fix covers in the Cover grid slightly stretched on high DPI screens
- Amazon metadata download: Fix publication date not being retrieved form amazon.co.jp
  Closes tickets: 2139414
Improved news sources
- Economist
